name: UE4 Short Game interview
description:
The game is simple ,you enter in a dark room , have a candle and a lighter and have to craft them to light up the candle, with which you can open the door at the end of the hallway. Simple as that.

Made with Unreal Engine version 4.26.2

The main features are :

Inventory system ,

craft system ,

main screen.

End Game Screen.

Pause Screen.

Audio hints.

Could use Keyboard/mouse or Gamepad to play it.

Audio Assets used :

  • Sfx : Free Xmas gift from : Matías Cerviño
  • Ambient Music: Future Ramen - Cyberpunk Vol. 1 FREE
